Title: Following Mao Zedong the world will turn red
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The Mao quote, bottom left: "The world is progressing and the future is bright. No one can change the general trend of history" (世界是在进步的，前途是光明的，这个历史的总趋势任何人也改变不了). Mao made the remark at the Yan'an cadre meeting on 17 October 1945, after returning from negotiations in Chongqing.
Theme: Quotations from Chairman MaoRed Sea Movement (1967-1968)Foreign Friends: National Liberation Movements
